page.shortlink: api a5 eval valid expression function
page.description: Used in code generated by the Script Genie. Checks to see if an expression (which must start with = ) is valid in the context of the current form.
page.prototype: Result as L = a5_eval_valid_expression(expression as C [, vars as P])

argument.name: expression
argument.description: An Xbasic expression. Expression must begin with an "=".

return.name: Result
return.description: If expression is valid, returns .t.; otherwise .f.
